page.title: 19PLAYGROUND GAMES CONTINUED
page.content: 4){Stick in the mud}is a game in which you have about six people. One is on and the rest run off. The one which is on runs after them and tries to stag them. If you are stagged you have to stand with your legs apart, until someone goes under your legs. 5) In{on the mountain}two people turn the rope and the other person jumps in and starts skipping. While the person is skiping a rhyme is sung. (This is part of the rhyme). {On the mountain}stands a lady Who she is we do not know All she wants is gold and silver Gold and silver and a nice young man Who shall we call him? (a boys name is sung then on with the game.)
